description: You'll love these delicious teriyaki chicken rice bowls, thanks to the nutritionally approved goodness of chicken breast, brown rice and broccolini.
name: Teriyaki Chicken & Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g Woolworths microwave brown rice, cooked as per package instructions

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chicken, soy, ginger, honey and cornflour in a medium bowl. Set aside.
Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook onion and broccolini for 4 minutes, stirring, or until tender. Transfer to a bowl.

Reheat same pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken and marinade, then cook for 4 minutes, stirring, or until chicken is golden and cooked through. Return vegetables to pan and toss to combine. Season with pepper.
Spoon heated rice into bowls and top with chicken, vegetables and cucumber.
